input.sentences: we had a great spot to see the location monument .
the monument looks great when lit up .
output.sentences: I saw the monument from the hotel balcony.
As it went dark, the monument lit up from below.
I'd been told there would be fireworks not far from it and I was excited to see them.
The fireworks started an hour after it went dark.
The display was really good but finale was awesome!
